```{r data import, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(wesanderson)
library(ggpubr)
source("helpers.R")
theme_set(theme_bw())
palette = wes_palette("Zissou1")

# load data and format
df = read.csv("../data/ordering-trials.csv", header = TRUE) %>%
  filter(utterance != "bot_check" )

df$response = gsub("\\[","",df$response)
df$response = gsub("\\]","",df$response)
df$response = as.numeric(df$response)
df$left_end = gsub('"',"",df$left_end)
df$right_end = gsub('"',"",df$right_end)
```

```{r data wrangling, include=FALSE}
# averaging ratings of configurations in which an adj appeared in first position (farther from the noun) --> greater values signal that a classâ€™s adjectives are preferred in first position, farther from the noun

# group by first position adjectives on one end (right) -- higher the mean, the more preferred they are in first position
df = df %>%
  mutate(right_end = str_replace(right_end,"black and white","black-and-white")) %>%
  mutate(left_end = str_replace(left_end,"black and white","black-and-white")) %>%
  mutate(first_pos = word(right_end, 1)) %>%
  mutate(second_pos = word(right_end, 2)) %>%
  mutate(response_first_pos= response) %>%
  mutate(response_second_pos = 1-response)
```

```{r preferenece, echo=FALSE}
d = df %>%
  group_by(label,first_pos,second_pos) %>%
  summarise(Mean_first=mean(response_first_pos), Mean_second=mean(response_second_pos))

d_long = gather(d,Mean_type,value,Mean_first:Mean_second)

ggplot(d,(aes(x=reorder(first_pos, -Mean),y=Mean))) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = YMin, ymax = YMax),width=.25) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust=1)) +
  xlab("adjectives") +
  ylab("mean rating in 1st position")

# more subjective adjectives are preferred farther from the noun
ggsave(file="../graphs/adj_first_pos.pdf",width=8,height=4)
```

```{r subjectivity, echo=FALSE}
# load subjectivity and faultless disagreement agv dataset
load("../../../04_subjectivity/english/data/subjectivity_and_disagreement.Rda")
subjectivity = d_wide

# merge and format
dt = merge(subjectivity,d, by.x = c("adj"), by.y = c("first_pos"),)
dt = dt %>% mutate(naturalness=Mean) %>% select(adj,naturalness,subjectivity,disagreement)

ggscatter(dt, x = "subjectivity", y = "naturalness", 
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "subjectivity", ylab = "naturalness", 
          label = "adj",font.label = c(8, "plain"))

#label.select = list(criteria = "`x` > 4 & `y` < 15"))
ggsave(file="../graphs/subjectivity-naturalness_labeled.pdf")

ggscatter(dt, x = "disagreement", y = "naturalness", 
          add = "reg.line", conf.int = TRUE, 
          cor.coef = TRUE, cor.method = "pearson",
          xlab = "faultless", ylab = "naturalness")
ggsave(file="../graphs/disagreement-naturalness.pdf")
```

```{r subjectivity_score, echo=FALSE}
dd = df %>%
  group_by(label,first_pos) %>%
  summarise(Mean=mean(response)) #%>%
  mutate(second_pos = ifelse(first_pos==as.character(adj1),as.character(adj2),ifelse(first_pos==as.character(adj2),as.character(adj1),NA))) %>%
  mutate(order=paste(first_pos,second_pos,object,sep = " "))

m = merge(dd, subjectivity, by.x = c("first_pos"), by.y = c("adj"), all.x=TRUE, all.y=FALSE)
m = merge(m, subjectivity, by.x = c("second_pos"), by.y = c("adj"),all.x = TRUE,all.y = FALSE)

dm = m %>% 
  rename(c("first_pos_subjectivity"="subjectivity.x","second_pos_subjectivity"="subjectivity.y")) %>%
  mutate(subjectivity_diff = first_pos_subjectivity-second_pos_subjectivity)

ggplot(dm,(aes(x=subjectivity_diff,y=Mean,color=object))) +
    geom_point(size=2)+
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust=1)) +
    geom_text(size=1.7,aes(label=order),hjust=0, vjust=0) +
    xlab("subjectivity difference") +
    ylab("mean naturalness score") +
    theme(legend.position = "none")

ggsave(file="../graphs/subjectivity-difference.pdf")
  
```
